bibl.title: Seven Heidelberg Papyri Concerning the Office of Exegetes.
bibl.note: 1. P. Heid. Inv. G 24. Report to an Exegetes. Hermopolite nome, 141/2 A.D. - 2. Inv. G 163. Application for lease of land. Idem, first cent. A.D. - 3-5. Inv G 299; 1017; 1207. Applications for Grain Dole. Idem, Jan. 12, 62 A.D.; Reign of Nero; 61/2 A.D. - 6-7. Inv. G 771; Inv. G 1837 + P. Ryl. II, 101 b. Two Eiskrisis Applications. Idem, about 62/63 A.D. P Heid. Inv. G 1837 and P. Ryl. II, 101 b are the upper left and right corners of the same document. - P. Heid. IV, 336-342.
bibl.seg: Kraut Bruce H., Seven Heidelberg Papyri Concerning the Office of Exegetes.
ZPE 55 (1984) pp. 167-190 et pll. VI b-IX.

1. P. Heid. Inv. G 24. Report to an Exegetes. Hermopolite nome, 141/2 A.D. - 2. Inv. G 163. Application for lease of land. Idem, first cent. A.D. - 3-5. Inv G 299; 1017; 1207. Applications for Grain Dole. Idem, Jan. 12, 62 A.D.; Reign of Nero; 61/2 A.D. - 6-7. Inv. G 771; Inv. G 1837 + P. Ryl. II, 101 b. Two Eiskrisis Applications. Idem, about 62/63 A.D. P Heid. Inv. G 1837 and P. Ryl. II, 101 b are the upper left and right corners of the same document. - P. Heid. IV, 336-342.
